amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide protective status to each section of the Conservation Area pending the completion of the management plan.

action.text: Substitute (A004) offered by Mr. Boehlert to the Udall (CO) amendment (A003).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehlert amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 211 (Roll no. 238).
